name: api_networking_UnityWebRequest
description: Provides methods to communicate with web servers.

properties.name: certificateHandler
properties.description: Holds a reference to a CertificateHandler object, which manages certificate validation for this Unit

properties.name: disposeCertificateHandlerOnDispose
properties.description: If true, any CertificateHandler attached to this UnityWebRequest will have CertificateHandler.Dispos

properties.name: disposeDownloadHandlerOnDispose
properties.description: If true, any DownloadHandler attached to this UnityWebRequest will have DownloadHandler.Dispose call

properties.name: disposeUploadHandlerOnDispose
properties.description: If true, any UploadHandler attached to this UnityWebRequest will have UploadHandler.Dispose called a

properties.name: downloadedBytes
properties.description: Returns the number of bytes of body data the system has downloaded from the remote server. (Read Onl

properties.name: downloadHandler
properties.description: Holds a reference to a DownloadHandler object, which manages body data received from the remote serv

properties.name: downloadProgress
properties.description: Returns a floating-point value between 0.0 and 1.0, indicating the progress of downloading body data

properties.name: error
properties.description: A human-readable string describing any system errors encountered by this UnityWebRequest object whil

properties.name: isDone
properties.description: Returns true after the UnityWebRequest has finished communicating with the remote server. (Read Only

properties.name: isModifiable
properties.description: Returns true while a UnityWebRequest’s configuration properties can be altered. (Read Only)

properties.name: method
properties.description: Defines the HTTP verb used by this UnityWebRequest, such as GET or POST.

properties.name: redirectLimit
properties.description: Indicates the number of redirects that this UnityWebRequest follows before halting with a Redirect L

properties.name: responseCode
properties.description: The numeric HTTP response code returned by the server, such as 200, 404 or 500. (Read Only)

properties.name: result
properties.description: The result of this UnityWebRequest.

properties.name: timeout
properties.description: The number of seconds after which UnityWebRequest attempts to abort the request if no response is re

properties.name: uploadedBytes
properties.description: Returns the number of bytes of body data the system has uploaded to the remote server. (Read Only)

properties.name: uploadHandler
properties.description: Holds a reference to the UploadHandler object which manages body data to be uploaded to the remote s

properties.name: uploadProgress
properties.description: Returns a floating-point value between 0.0 and 1.0, indicating the progress of uploading body data t

properties.name: uri
properties.description: Defines the target URI for the UnityWebRequest to communicate with.

properties.name: url
properties.description: Defines the target URL for the UnityWebRequest to communicate with.
